MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.30pm to repair faulty overhead equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:41PM on Thursday 25 February 2021.
